text:
With the all-ladies Ocean’s 8 coming this summer, I find that lately all I want to do is watch Ocean’s Eleven, Ocean’s Twelve (yes, I do enjoy Ocean’s Twelve, let me live), and Ocean’s Thirteen. This is a simple enough desire, right? But unfortunately, for some reason, they are never all streaming at the same time. It’s like, one month Ocean’s Eleven will be here, and then Ocean’s Thirteen ends up on another streaming platform, and everyone has just agreed to forget about Ocean’s Twelve (except me), so that’s nowhere. It’s driving me mad. Can’t a girl get her Danny Ocean caper fix when she wants it??

Well, thankfully, someone has been looking at my vision board, and in February all three Ocean’s movies are coming to Netflix. Yes, along with binging (and re-binging) your favorite shows, you’ll be able to binge-watch Danny Ocean steal SO MUCH STUFF, thanks to Netflix. Would it be weird to throw an actual Ocean’s trilogy party? Does that sound like the best night ever, or is it just me? Would you show up to that? (You don’t have to answer if you don’t want to.)

Ocean’s Eleven, Ocean’s Twelve, and Ocean’s Thirteen all land on Netflix on February 1st, so mark your calendars. That gives you plenty of time to watch all three movies *at least* a dozen times before Ocean’s 8 lands in theaters on June 8th, 2018 (nice work there with the multiple 8s).

These three titles are just a handful of the dozens of new shows, movies, and specials that will land on Netflix next month. We’ll have the full list on Tuesday, so be sure and check back here then to make sure you can start planning your viewing schedule for the month. Or start planning your own Ocean’s party. You do you.
title: All three "Ocean's" movies are coming to Netflix in February

meta_data.description: If you've been looking for a place to watch all the "Ocean's" movies, Netflix has you covered — Ocean's Eleven, Twelve, and Thirteen will soon be streaming.
